bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
docs.streamlit.io doesn't have a favicon as streamlit.io does. Tried using favicon from frontend/public/, and found it to be the older ~~ favicon, so I updated that as well. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/162028/71937532-85869580-3161-11ea-9a34-a183a87ff14a.png></denchmark-link>
